DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate effect use new app-based technology improve self-care , compare usual care patient type 2 diabetes . The hypothesis intervention , i.e . use new technology , great positive effect physical activity level outcomes HbA1c usual care .
DOC.brief_title: App-technology Increase Physical Activity Among Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Have diagnosis type 2 diabetes 18 year age old Ability communicate Swedish Own use smartphone Not able walk
